```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(fec16)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r renigma}
renigma <- function(n){
  x = runif(n)
  y = runif(n, min=0, max = (1-x)^2)
  data.frame(x=x,y=y)
}
plot(renigma(100))
```

```{r mystery}
rmystery <- function(n){
  x = runif(n)
  y = runif(n, min=0, max = 1/x)
  data.frame(x=x,y=y)
}
plot(rmystery(100000))
```

```{r experiment, echo=FALSE}
  experiment_e <-rmystery(1000)
  my_model<-lm(x~y, data = experiment_e)
  final_distr<-data.frame(coefficients(my_model)[["y"]])
```


```{r experiment, echo=FALSE}
for (i in 1:1000){
  experiment_e <-rmystery(10000)
  my_model<-lm(x~y, data = experiment_e)
  final_distr<-rbind(final_distr, coefficients(my_model)[["y"]])
}

ggplot(data = final_distr) + 
aes(x = coefficients.my_model....y...) + 
geom_histogram(bins = 50)

```
